pages.text: Nests can be found scattered around the world and will each be the home of 1 solitary bee. Nests can be picked up with the bee inside by breaking it, no need for silk touch. To clear a nest of it's bee and any eggs you simply need to craft it with itself.
Empty nests can attract new bees if you put one or more honey treats in them. Right click with a honey treat to start the repopulation cooldown.
